entry.title: Former FTX Executive Salame Seeks to Overturn Conviction Alleging Breach of Deal on Partner’s Probe
entry.summary: Lawyers for Salame argue the Government “failed to abide by its word” by resuming its investigation into his partner, Michelle Bond.

entry.title: Second Neuralink Patient Does 3D Design and Plays CounterStrike With His Brain
entry.summary: Like the company’s first patient, “Alex” is an avid gamer, and has set new records for brain-controlled computer interfaces.

entry.title: FCC Reaches $1 Million Settlement With Telco Over Election-Meddling Involving AI
entry.summary: While Michigan-based Lingo Telecom had not produced the deepfake material, the FCC took action against the company for failing in its duty.

entry.title: Archer Aviation Readies Its Air Taxi Service in Los Angeles
entry.summary: The FAA has approved the company’s plan to shuttle people through the skies ahead of the 2028 Olympic Games.

entry.title: Kamala Harris Advisor Says VP Open to Crypto: Bloomberg
entry.summary: A senior campaign advisor cited the need for rules for “that sort of industry,” but the statement was hailed as a breakthrough.

entry.title: SunPump Flips Pump.Fun in Daily Meme Coins as Traders Shift to Tron
entry.summary: Tron’s SunPump now tops Solana’s Pump.fun in terms of newly created tokens over the last day. Will the momentum shift last?

entry.title: Ideogram Releases New AI Image Model to Compete With Flux, Midjourney
entry.summary: Ideogram 2.0 steps up its realism and adds features that could vault the company back to the top.

entry.title: NBA Star Jimmy Butler and Ben ‘Bitboy’ Armstrong Settle in Binance Lawsuit
entry.summary: The pro basketball player agreed to pay $300,000 to alleged Binance victims, while the influencer agreed to a $40,000 settlement.

entry.title: Here Are Today's ‘Hamster Kombat’ Daily Combo and Cipher Code
entry.summary: Looking for the daily combo and cipher code for Wednesday, August 21? Here’s what you need to make bank in Telegram game Hamster Kombat.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Up Slightly as Fed Looks to ‘Ease Policy’ in September
entry.summary: The price of Bitcoin is back up over $60,000 per coin as the Federal Reserve posts notes from its last meeting.

entry.title: McRugged: Hackers Take Over McDonald’s Instagram, Make $700K on Fake Grimace Token
entry.summary: Hackers put the Solana meme coin scam in front of some 5 million McDonald's followers before pulling the rug and flaunting their gains.

entry.title: FutureNet Co-Founder Arrested in Montenegro Over Alleged $21 Million Fraud
entry.summary: Roman Zimian, who founded the alleged "large-scale international pyramid scheme" FutureNet, had previously escaped from house arrest in Italy.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 184 - PUNKS ARE FLYING!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$88m, ETH ETFs: -$7m. BTC funding negative in ‘short squeeze’ setup. BTC dominance up 18% in 2 years. TRX leads L1s as memecoin activity soars. Chance of SOL ETF is zero in 2024: Bloomberg. Another SOL ETF approved in Brazil. Binance & CZ face new class action lawsuit. Tether to launch UAE-Dirham stablecoin. Mt Gox moves $700m in BTC. CRV founder faces backlash on DAO proposal.

entry.title: BlackRock's Ethereum ETF Hits $1 Billion in Net Gains, Nearly Tripling Fidelity
entry.summary: BlackRock’s spot Ethereum ETF crossed $1 billion in cumulative net inflows Tuesday, nearly tripling flows for Fidelity's runner-up.

entry.title: German Authorities Seize $279,000 in Bitcoin ATM Crackdown
entry.summary: Financial regulators and law enforcement agencies shut down 13 cryptocurrency ATMs operating without proper authorization.

entry.title: Move-to-Earn Game ‘Stepn Go’ Reveals G-Shock NFT Sneaker Collab
entry.summary: Casio’s Virtual G-Shock project is expanding from digital watches to sneakers, thanks to social move-to-earn game Stepn Go.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Didn't Have 'Character of a Thief': Author Michael Lewis
entry.summary: "Going Infinite" author Michael Lewis defended his book about the disgraced FTX founder as a "fuller description of events" in a new essay.

entry.title: Here Are Today’s ‘X Empire’ Elon Musk Game Daily Combo and Riddle
entry.summary: Looking for the X Empire daily combo and riddle solution for Wednesday, August 21? Here are the latest boosts for the Telegram crypto game.

entry.title: ENS Labs Teams With Dentity to Advance Real-World Credentials via Crypto
entry.summary: Both companies plan to integrate verifiable credentials on-chain to bridge the gap between off-chain and online identities.

entry.title: Story Protocol Raises $80 Million in Bid to Shake Up IP Ownership in the AI Era
entry.summary: Blockchain can replace “a medieval, antiquated system,” PIP Labs cofounder Jason Zhao told Decrypt ahead of its testnet launch.

entry.title: Bitcoin Dominance Hits 56% as Long-Term Holders Accumulate: Glassnode
entry.summary: A new Glassnode report reveals that despite recent price action, long-term Bitcoin holders remain unwavering in their conviction.

entry.title: Crypto Payment Network for AI Agents Launched by Former Ripple Execs
entry.summary: The company, Skyfire, raised $8.5 million to help AI get things done, even when it involves paying for something.

entry.title: Nym Opens Beta for NymVPN, 'The World's Most Private VPN'
entry.summary: Nym Technologies first took its VPN out of stealth at the 2019 Web3 Summit, with the app now open for public beta testing.

entry.title: Tether Announces Plans for UAE Dirham-Pegged Stablecoin
entry.summary: The proposed Dirham-pegged token will join Tether's existing lineup of stablecoins, which includes those pegged to the US Dollar and Euro.

entry.title: Binance Hit With Fresh Class Action Lawsuit Over Money Laundering Allegations
entry.summary: The lawsuit alleges that Binance’s negligent compliance practices allowed bad actors to use the platform to launder stolen crypto.

entry.title: How Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s Exit From Presidential Race Could Raise Crypto's Profile in Washington
entry.summary: The nephew of former president John F. Kennedy had made crypto central to his platform. His endorsement of Trump could prove critical.

entry.title: Bitcoin Setup ‘Ripe’ for a Short Squeeze as Mt. Gox Shifts $850 Million in BTC
entry.summary: Negative perpetual funding rates and a spike in open interest for Bitcoin could hint at a phenomenon known as a "short squeeze," K33 said.

entry.title: Midjourney Beefs Up Its AI Image Editor—Here’s How To Use It
entry.summary: The best way to use Midjourney is now on the web, not Discord. Let's review all the new tools you can now use.

entry.title: Another Solana ETF Approved in Brazil—What About the US?
entry.summary: Efforts to secure regulatory approval for spot Solana ETFs have apparently stagnated in the U.S., but asset manager VanEck says its planned fund is “still in play.”

entry.title: OpenAI and Condé Nast Ink Multi-Year Deal to Serve News Through AI
entry.summary: Condé Nast’s CEO says the deal with allow them to recover losses in revenue and protect and invest in journalism.

entry.title: Gold Hits All-Time High—Why Isn’t Bitcoin Matching Its Gains?
entry.summary: While the precious metal has surged in value, the volatility of so-called “digital gold” is through the roof.

entry.title: Solana's Polymarket Rival Drift Draws Over $3 Million in Liquidity in Debut
entry.summary: Drift Protocol spun up a new prediction market on Monday, and the price of its own token has surged.

entry.title: Ethereum Gas Fees Fall as Experts Foresee an ETH Price Bottom
entry.summary: A number of factors have shifted focus from ETH, but there are reasons to expect its price to rebound.

entry.title: Malaysian Police Crushed Hundreds of Bitcoin Mining Rigs With a Steamroller
entry.summary: Amid a countrywide crackdown on electricity theft, Bitcoin mining rigs faced their fate—being pulverized in a parking lot for cameras.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 183 - WE ARE NOW SHITCOINING ON TRON
entry.summary: Crypto follows stocks higher, BTC rallies to $61k. SOL funds saw largest weekly outflow ever. Tether mints another $1bn on Tron. SEC blocked SOL ETF from CBoE. China classifies crypto for money laundering. DNC platform doesn’t mention crypto. Rumours Gensler may be Treasury Secretary pick. Chrome extension ‘Bull Checker’ leads to exploits. Genesis-linked wallet hacked for $238m. ADA drops out of the top 10 coins.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 182 - STABLECOIN CAP NEARS ATH
entry.summary: Crypto falls as soon as US stock futures open higher. Crypto funds saw $30m inflows last week. Stablecoin market cap nears ATH. US may increase crypto reporting standards. Justin Sun hints at lift to China crypto ban. Tether to launch USDT on Aptos. MATIC to POL migration on September 4th. TON leads L1s on continued gaming strength.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 181 - GIGA HITS $300M
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$11m, ETH ETFs: -$40m. BTC hits $56k then rebounds, $176m liquidated. Schumer says crypto policy can pass this year. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. Bernstein moves several BTC miners to ‘Outperform’. Miners raised $2.2bn in Q2 to help cash crunch. EigenLayer TVL falls $351m after airdrop controversy. ARB announces staking. S. Korea pension fund buys $34m of MicroStrategy. Coinbase allows gold & oil futures trading.

entry.title: This Hedge Fund Buys Meme Coins. Here’s Why.
entry.summary: Crypto hedge fund Stratos bought Dogwifhat (WIF) when it was just 1 cent and has since continued investing in meme coins. We spoke with Rennick Palley, founder of Stratos, to hear the firm’s perspective on investing in these tokens.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 180 - BTC BACK DOWN, AGAIN
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$81m, ETH ETFs: +$11m. Crypto falls as markets react negatively to CPI print. BTC whale buying slows, death cross on weekly. Low CPI print could still lead to BTC ATH: Grayscale. Exchanges see $1bn USDT withdrawal. US government sends $584m BTC to exchanges. Apple Pay may soon allow USDC payments. Schumer vows to pass crypto regulation this year. Morgan Stanley discloses $188m BTC ETF holding. Vanguard say they won’t do BTC ETFs. Marathon Digital buys $249m BTC. DeFi rises as Aave hits weekly high in borrowers. BitGo continues to stress autonomy from Justin Sun. Binance returns to India.

entry.title: Shark Tank's Kevin O'Leary Welcomes Crypto Regulation, Slams Celebrity 'Shitcoins'
entry.summary: Whether it's celebrity meme coins or Tom Brady, Canadian investor and "Shark Tank" star Kevin O'Leary tells it like it is. In this interview with Decrypt reporter André Beganski, O'Leary breaks down his approach to the crypto market and why "cowboys" became a thing of the past. Amid crypto's "renaissance" period, he sees prediction markets and stablecoins as bright spots, while regulation looks inevitable for a maturing industry.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 179 - PUMP FUN STILL RISING!
entry.summary: Crypto rallies ahead of key CPI data today. $2bn more Mt. Gox BTC readies to moved. Jump transfers another $46m ETH to sell. SOL stablecoin TVL up $1bn in the last 3 weeks. Goldman Sachs show $418m BTC ETF. BTC ETFs will soon surpass Satoshi’s holding. ETH L2 transactions hit record 12.4m. Harris advisors have poor history with crypto policy. Bitget wallet overtakes MetaMask by downloads. Coinbase say cbBTC wrapped Bitcoin coming.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 178 - TRUMP AND ELON ON X
entry.summary: SOLETH down 10% from ATH. Grayscale ETH ETF shows no outflows. Bitcoin slump due to rising Kamala odds: Bernstein. Alt season won’t return until BTC above $70k: Hayes. PayPal stablecoin on SOL flips ETH TVL. 3AC files $1.3bn claim against Terraform Labs. Marathon to stamp ‘Made in USA’ on mined BTC. Trump & Elon don’t mention crypto in interview. Coinbase urges SEC to abandon DeFi exchange rule. Several VCs receive SEC letters over Uniswap. OP hints at upcoming ‘Superchain’.

entry.title: Deadrop Co-Creator Discusses ‘Shock’ of Dr. Disrespect Allegations & Future Plans
entry.summary: More than a month after famed gaming influencer Dr. Disrespect was dropped by Midnight Society, the studio building the first-person shooter Deadrop, the team has finally broken its silence in an exclusive interview with Decrypt’s GG to discuss the move to remove the streamer from the company—and how the game can move forward.

entry.title: Gigachad: A Crypto Coin With An Alpha Male Mindset
entry.summary: Gigachad is a meme coin centered around a meme that originates from 2017 after a photographer posted a bodybuilder with an unrealistically insane body. He was later named ‘Gigachad’ by 4Chan users.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 176 - ETH LEADS THE CHARGE
entry.summary: ETH leads gains in majors, ETHE outflows slowing. Putin signs crypto mining bill. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. Tether plans to double staff to improve compliance. Turkey sees surge in exchange applications. SEC plans to appeal XRP ruling. Franklin Templeton launches fund on ARB. SUI leads altcoins after Grayscale fund announced. TIA rises 20%, will launch mainnet in September. STX will launch final Nakamoto Code this month. Coinbase questions CFTC prediction market rules.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 175 - THE FTX SAGA CONTINUES
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$45m, ETH ETFs: -$24m. XRP settles with SEC for $125m, rises 20%. FTX ordered to repay $12.7bn. BTC Mayer Multiple hits lowest since FTX. Saylor personally owns over $1bn BTC. Dems launch ‘Crypto for Harris’ group. Brazil approves first spot SOL ETF. Robinhood crypto revenue up 161%. Ethena launches stablecoin on SOL. Jump likely shut ‘development arm’, not trading. Nomad bridge hacker moves $35m to Tornado. Metaplanet to buy $6.8m more BTC. Binance to list TON for spot. Binance invests in SOL restaking protocol. Arbitrum Orbit chains to use USDC for gas.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 174 - SOL BOUNCES 40%
entry.summary: SOL continues to lead majors, memecoins run higher. SOL/ETH hits ATH, breaks key resistance level. BTC whales bought $23bn in last month. BTC volatility hits 20-month high. NASDAQ & BlackRock ask to list ETH options. ETH ETF inflows outpace BTC. BlackRock ETH ETF sees $900m inflows so far. New ETH L2 created ‘every 19 days’. $2bn of seized ETH transferred by Chinese police. Jump continues to exit ETH position. Move in Yen is opportunity to buy BTC: Hayes. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. DeFi revenues soar, AAVE makes $6m in one day. HyperLiquid sees record $4.3bn of trade volume. Binance saw $1.2bn inflows, biggest inflow of 2024. Nearly every Binance launchpad coin is now red. Kamala reschedules crypto leaders meetup.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 173 - ARE WE BACK?
entry.summary: BTC & ETH ETFs see huge $6bn of trading volume. ‘Real number’ of liquidations estimated at $7-9bn. 274k traders liquidated on move. 60% of top 50 coins now red for 2024. Trump says US should not sell crypto holdings. Bitcoin not as good a hedge as gold: Cramer. Ark buys $18m Coinbase stock in drop. Capula reports $460m BTC ETF holding. Moonpay has highest volume day since April. Ronin bridge saved in 4000ETH white-hat hack. Bitcoin is pretend internet money: Tezos founder.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 172 - A VERY RED DAY FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Bitcoin hits $50k, liquidations hit $1bn in sell-off. Macro sell-off and end of Yen carry trade blamed. Multiple altcoins hit cycle or all-time lows. Bitcoin dominance rises to cycle-high of 58%. Robinhood halts 24hr trading. Crypto funds saw $528m outflow last week. Justin Sun denies liquidation rumours. Jump Trading continues to liquidate holdings. Ethena founder confirms protocol has ‘zero issues’. Binance launches native KAS mining. Cycle hasn’t even started yet: Cobie.

entry.title: Mog: The 4Chan Meme Now Worth $800 MILLION
entry.summary: Mogging started on 4Chan back in 2016 as a slang term to dominate another person. But now, eight years later, mog has redefined itself through an Ethereum meme coin. Crypto traders Aug and Slumpt often joked that they’d launch a cryptocurrency around the mogging meme but never really pulled through. That was until Aug decided to press the button.

entry.title: Fomo Hour 171 - The Bitcoin Bounce
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +51m, ETH ETFs: +$26m. BTC bounces at $62k amid $300m liquidations. BTC volatility hits 2 month high. SOL flips ETH monthly DEX volume. SOL rumour claims insiders own 8%. Coinbase shares rise 2% after strong earnings. Marathon Digital falls 8% after revenue miss. Bybit exits France over regulation. Crypto(.)com surpasses Coinbase volume. Do Kwon will be extradited to South Korea. CVG falls 99% after exploit. JUP votes to reduce 30% team supply.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 170 - BITCOIN FALLS BELOW 65K
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +0m, ETH ETFs: -$77m. Crypto falls after Fed, Trump speech & Iran threats. Mt. Gox still has $2.1bn BTC after distributions. Lummis introduces bill to buy 1m BTC. Large BTC holders bought $5.4bn in July. Tether makes $1.3bn profit in Q2. DeFi loans hit 2022 levels. Base sees 80% of active Uniswap traders. $900m of altcoin unlocks this month. Elixir launches deUSD as rival to Ethena.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 169 - NEIRO HITS $100M!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$18m, ETH ETFs: +$34m. Mt. Gox move another $3bn BTC, prices stable. ETH ETFs see net inflow as Grayscale outflow slows. BTC exchange reserves hit multi-year low. XRP up 7% ahead of potential SEC settlement. UAE banks integrate crypto trading. Bybit integrates USDe with up to 20% yield. California DMV puts 42m car titles on AVAX. BTC mining to be a $20bn industry: Bernstein. Russia legalises various crypto activities. Terra blockchain halted, Astro faces $6.8m exploit. Trump raised $21m at BTC conference.
